revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRT54GP2 |revision=A-AT |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |availability=EoL |fcc_date=07/26/2004 |fcc_id=Q87-WRV54GP2M |ic_id=3839A-WRVGP2M |pcb_id= |type=wireless router, analog phone gateway |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP425 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=8 MiB |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F640J3C-120 |ram1=32 MiB |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC42S16800-7T |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 5-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J2 |wi1_module=Linksys WRV54GP2M |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Inprocomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPN2220;IPN2220, Q48501.1, A041602; |wi1_chip2_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip2_model=RF2959 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-TNC |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Altima |eth_chip2_model=AC101L;AC101LKQT, TD0438 P11, 726762A; |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=ADMtek |sw_model=ADM6996L;ADM6996L, AA0432, HSS425034.ISL; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Programable SLIC;Silicon Labs;Si3210;Si2310-KT, 0436ECCABQ;2; ,,, Line-side device;Silicon Labs;Si3201;Si3201-KS, 0441EKCAAT;2; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=VxWorks;5.5.1; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=linksys |default_ssid_regex=^linksys$ |default_ip=192.168.15.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:12:17 |oui_eth=00:12:17 }} {{TagLine|Wireless-G Broadband Router with 2 Phone Ports}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRT54GP2A-AT}} "3751-36100201" is silkscreened on the wireless module in the FCC photos. :''[[CyberTAN]]'' is the presumed OEM of this device. *"3762-16141005" and a date code of ''0441'' is silkscreened :on the main board of a sample production unit's board. *"3761-36100202" and a date code of ''0440'' is silkscreened :on the wireless module board. *The [[CyberTAN WGV614-A3]] (w/ omitted VoIP subsection) and :the [[Linksys RT41P2-AT]] (w/ omitted miniPCI slot + wireless) :appear to share the same board. {{WiFiCert|W002822|08/18/2004}} ===Forum posts=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=3151 Primary '''DD-WRT''' Forum support thread] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=27957 Specs noted in another '''DD-WRT''' Forum thread] ===Internal shots=== *[http://zhmaozz.blog.163.com/blog/static/7259495220091241112698/ Internal shots on some Chinese blog] :The processor is part FWIXP425BC. *[http://www.topwifi.cn/bbs/thread-70-1-1.html Additional internal shot] ===Serial=== ====Pinout==== 
(GND)
(...)
(RxD)
(TxD)
[...]
J2
